mapper.select: SELECT * FROM houseinfo where (dongCode like concat(#{lawdcd}, '%')) group by aptName;

SELECT hi.aptName, hi.jibun, hd.dealAmount, hd.dealYear, hd.dealMonth, hd.dealDay, hd.area, hd.floor FROM housedeal hd, houseinfo hi where hd.aptCode= #{aptCode} and hi.aptCode = hd.aptCode ORDER BY dealYear DESC, dealMonth DESC;
